body:
Hi Mostapha,

I get the same error..I've seen all the discussion replies; I updated the file components as Rania did too; I wrote a new the algorithm so to avoid Rania problems(as suggested from Chris) but still I have the same error: "1. No surface information was found in the imported .eio file adjacent to the .csv _resultFileAddress.Data cannot be normalized by surface area and the data tree outputs for surface data will not be grafted by zone". It's a long time that I'm trying to figure out what's the problem..could you please have a look to the file?THANK YOU SO MUCH
